actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until July 1, 1976, the duty on certain elbow prostheses if imported for use, or for free distribution, by certain public or private nonprofit institutions.

summary.text: Suspends until July 1, 1976, the duty on externally-powered electric elbow protheses and parts thereof, if imported for use or for distribution free of charge, by any public or private nonprofit institution established for educational, scientific, or therapeutic purposes.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until July 1, 1976, the duty on certain elbow prostheses if imported for use, or for free distribution, by certain public or private nonprofit institutions.
